subject: Pedals
description_text:
Hi, I was setting my Sim rig back up and tried to recalibrate my Simsonn
Plus X
pedals but I saw that there is new software and I have no idea where to
update my pedals. I tried to manually update but it's still not reading.
Its saying that it's an old version. I get taken to an error page when I
try to download driver software.

I checked Amazon and it seems like there was a big upgrade to the pedals
and the controller from when I bought it back in February of this year.

I am probably asking for too much but is it possible to be sent replacement
pedals? Or a legit file where I can download and update the pedals?

Thanks for your help

conversations.body_text:
Here you go. I wasn't aware that I had to get another box to use the
software.

Hi Kyle Kong,    You can use Simsonn Manager 2.1.0 to restore the firmware.  Go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.  After the update, the pedals should work normally and allow you to recalibrate them.
